4.eng-name: The Book of Ghusl and Tayammum

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Busrah bin Safwan that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"Whoever touches his penis, he should not perform Salah until he performs Wudu'." Abu 'Abdur-Rahman (An-Nasa'i) said: Hisham bin 'Urwah did not hear this Hadith from his father
